Entrees.name: Omelette
Entrees.desc: A fresh omelette filled with cheddar cheese and your choice of vegetables or ground beef.

Entrees.name: Sunny Side Ups and Toast
Entrees.desc: Two (2) fried eggs with runny yolk served on sourdough toast.

Entrees.name: Scrambled Eggs
Entrees.desc: A plate of classic, seasoned scrambled eggs.

Entrees.name: French Toast
Entrees.desc: Two (2) slabs of toast with cinnamon and topped with chopped fruit and your choice of strawberry, blueberry, or maple syrup.

Entrees.name: Pancakes
Entrees.desc: Three (3) pancakes topped with butter and your choice of strawberry, blueberry, or maple syrup.

Entrees.name: Crepes
Entrees.desc: Two (2) crepes topped with strawberries and filled with cream cheese.

Entrees.name: Breakfast Burger
Entrees.desc: A hearty beef patty topped with avocado, bacon, and a fried egg served in between two biscuits.

Entrees.name: Avocado Toast
Entrees.desc: Toast served with avocado and everything bagel seasoning.

Entrees.name: Chorizo Breakfast Burrito
Entrees.desc: A burrito filled with scrambled eggs, chopped vegetables, and chorizo sausage.

Sides.name: House Potatoes
Sides.desc: A plate of seasoned and fried potato wedges.

Sides.name: Hash Browns
Sides.desc: A plate of crispy hash browns.

Sides.name: Fruit Cup
Sides.desc: A cup of grapes, melons, and orange slices.

Sides.name: Toast
Sides.desc: Two (2) pieces of toast topped with your choice of butter or jelly.
